channel.title: James brown died today! :(
channel.description:
http://news.yahoo.com/s/ap/20061226/ap_en_mu/obit_brown
James Brown, the man, died today on Christmas at the age of 73. :(

item.title: James brown died today! :(
item.dc:creator: @Mopman Mopman
item.description:
@Mopman wrote:

It’s well known that James Brown had a… less than perfect… personal life.

However, musically he affected much more than most really imagine, across all genres. It’s a shame.

Read full topic

item.title: James brown died today! :(
item.dc:creator: @PaulT PaulT
item.description:
@PaulT wrote:

Old news is so exciting.

But for you Ron, I’ll pretend it’s new. When I heard he died earlier today, I mumbled something about hammer time and gnarls barkley, but my true feelings are actually much shallower than that. I don’t know enough to comment on what a profound influence James Brown had on the musical community and the R&B scene, so I’ll just assume he really didn’t do much.

So I leave you with this wacked out picture of James Brown, arresting after leaving his house high on PCP after busting down the door of a nearby convention for rich white people, where he demanded to know if any of them had used his toilet, and if so “Wuffo?” (This is a true story)


Respeck.

Read full topic
